text: Could I have but a line a century hence crediting a contribution to the advance of peace, I would yield every honor which has been accorded by war.
author: Douglas MacArthur

text: Fair peace becomes men ferocious anger belongs to beasts.
author: Ovid

text: Peace of mind comes from not wanting to change others.
author: Gerald Jampolsky

text: We've climbed the mighty mountain. I see the valley below, and it's a valley of peace.
author: George W. Bush

text: In the whole round of human affairs little is so fatal to peace as misunderstanding.
author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster
